exceptions.tactic: assert (H: scal (opp one) u = opp u).
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x : V u : V -> Prop The term "u" has type "V -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "ModuleSpace.sort ?t ?V".
The LHS of plus_opp_r (plus _ (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros x u. assert (H: scal (opp one) u = opp u). - rewrite <- scal_one at 1. rewrite plus_opp_r. symmetry. apply scal_zero_l. rewrite <- opp_mult_m1. apply H.
